name: places/ChIJe_fgkJ5ZwokR9PHPTDlfE2Y
formattedAddress: 497 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 497 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013-1314, USA

originalText.text:
In Mid 2024, I contacted Dr. Garfein, who was referred by two other breast surgeons to perform what would be a complicated breast restructuring procedure. When I called him, I got voicemail and left a detailed message describing my situation. I was pleasantly surprised when he called back immediately and listened patiently to my long case history that I battled over the course of 14 years. His detailed questions shocked me in comparison to the other two surgeons I had interviewed. He was unbelievably thorough and extremely personable and sympathetic to my story.

Later when we met in person, I waited in the waiting room in the Bronx for literally less than two minutes, before he personally came out and asked me to come back with him. I spent over an hour with him, as he performed a thorough examination, asking more detailed questions about my history. He said he had to be honest with me that it would be a complicated procedure, but he would do what he could to help improve my current situation.

I had met several other surgeons, but no one made me feel as comfortable and assured that he really cared about me and would only do what he felt confident he could to do to reconstruct my breast. I knew then that I met the surgeon I would use and that while he couldn’t promise success, he wouldn’t perform the surgery unless he believed it would be successful.

I wanted to do the surgery right away before my trip to Europe with my children, but he insisted that I wait until I got back with a very authoritative tone. I liked that he put me appropriately in my place and I knew I had met my match. He gave me his cell phone number and said to stay in touch and that he would need to see me four weeks before the surgery.

At the time of surgery, Dr. Garfein made sure that I was provided with the best anesthesia and pain block possible to make me the most comfortable.

Post the procedure he called every hour to check on me and continued to periodically check in and insist that I call him if I had any questions. I have met so many doctors over my life, and I really rarely have met someone as warm and caring as Dr. Garfein.

The outcome of my surgery was a success, but more surgery is needed to finish the job as he had told me would be the case. I would highly recommend him to my loved ones or anyone who wants a wonderful and talented surgeon to take care of them. He genuinely cares so much about his patients and has their best interests at heart.
